pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, June 10, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Mont-Saint-Hilaire, Quebec

8:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will make an announcement and hold a media availability.

Gault Nature Reserve
422, chemin des Moulins

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 8:15 a.m.
  • This event will take place outdoors.

Ottawa, Ontario

6:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a dinner in honour of the Right Honourable John Turner’s 90th birthday.

Closed to media.

Media appearance

7:40 a.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air on Radio-Canada’s Gravel le matin.
